name: AERO ENTERPRISES
description: AERO ENTERPRISES is your trusted partner for precision sheet metal supply. We offer high-quality, custom metal solutions tailored to your needs. Serving industries nationwide with excellence and reliability.

address.streetAddress: Gala No. 1, Khan Compound, Near Gausiya Weight Kata, Dhumal Nagar

itemOffered.name: COLD ROLLED COIL - CRC SHEET
itemOffered.description: CRC sheets offer a smooth surface and precise thickness for superior formability. Ideal for automotive, appliances, and precision engineering applications.

itemOffered.name: HOT ROLLED - HR SHEET
itemOffered.description: HR sheets provide cost-effective strength and ductility for structural uses. Perfect for construction, pipelines, and heavy machinery fabrication.

itemOffered.name: GALVANIZED IRON - GI Sheet
itemOffered.description: GI sheets feature a zinc coating for excellent corrosion resistance. Widely used in roofing, cladding, and HVAC systems.

itemOffered.name: PICKLED AND OILED - PICKLE SHEET
itemOffered.description: Pickle sheets have a clean, scale-free surface for enhanced workability. Suitable for automotive, tubing, and structural fabrications.

itemOffered.name: STAINLESS STEEL - SS SHEET
itemOffered.description: SS sheets deliver corrosion resistance and a sleek finish for diverse applications. Ideal for kitchen equipment, architecture, and marine environments.
